articles.description: YouTube permanent spaces, which are for the creators, will not open after the pandemic. The company has confirmed this in an official blog. The Creators Space
articles.content: The Creators Space is a place that offers several resources and networking opportunities to the creators. YouTube is planning a hybrid model instead of the prior space model. This hybrid model will h… [+2799 chars]
